Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, I believe its true value exceeds $10000. Considering its exceptional nature, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this fantastic opportunity to elevate your collection or experience. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
